info.name: Duckduckgo-Google Theme
info.description:
Tried to replicate Google's UI as much as possible.
Made some changes on top of duckduckgo-google-u theme to replicate google fully.
info.additionalInfo:
You need to set the following options in DDG's preferences:
A. Themes
- Set the theme to Basic

B. Appearance
- Font: Arial
- Font size: Large
- Background Color: #FFFFFF or white
- Result title font: Arial
- Result Visited Title Color: #660099

All Credits goes to lelimacon - author of MinimalDuck
& Kekebo - author of DuckDuckGooglyMoogly
